eg.projects

Class SelectedProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.SelectedProject

  • public class SelectedProject
extends java.lang.Object
    The selection and creation of an object of type ProjectActions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectedProject(ProjectUIUpdate update, ProcessStarter proc, ConsolePanel console)
      Creates a SelectedProject and sets the references that may be used by ProjectActions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProjectActions createProjectByExt(java.lang.String fileExt)
      Returns a ProjectActions based on the file extension and creates the SettingsWin for the project.
      ProjectActions createProjectByLang(Languages lang)
      Returns a ProjectActions based on the specified language and creates the SettingsWin for the project.
      void enableActions(java.lang.String className, MainWin mw)
      Enables action components in the menu and toolbar depending on the name of the class that implements ProjectActions

      • SelectedProject

        public SelectedProject(ProjectUIUpdate update,
                       ProcessStarter proc,
                       ConsolePanel console)
        Creates a SelectedProject and sets the references that may be used by ProjectActions

    • Method Detail

      • createProjectByExt

        public ProjectActions createProjectByExt(java.lang.String fileExt)
        Returns a ProjectActions based on the file extension and creates the SettingsWin for the project.
        Parameters:
        fileExt - the file extension which a project is to be defined for
        Returns:
        an object of type ProjectActions

      • createProjectByLang

        public ProjectActions createProjectByLang(Languages lang)
        Returns a ProjectActions based on the specified language and creates the SettingsWin for the project.
        Parameters:
        lang - the language which has a value from Languages
        Returns:
        an object of type ProjectActions

      • enableActions

        public void enableActions(java.lang.String className,
                          MainWin mw)
        Enables action components in the menu and toolbar depending on the name of the class that implements ProjectActions
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the class
        mw - the MainWin
